title: BRIEF-Bass Metals Says Graphmada On Track To Achieve Record Mining Metrics In Sept Qtr
text:
BRIEF-Bass Metals Says Graphmada On Track To Achieve Record Mining Metrics In Sept Qtr

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 04, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bass Metals Says Graphmada On Track To Achieve Record Mining Metrics In Sept Qtr Sept 4 (Reuters) - Bass Metals Ltd : * GRAPHMADA IS ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE RECORD MINING METRICS IN SEPTEMBER QUARTER * BASS METALS SAYS AT GRAPHMADA GRAPHITE MINE 745 WET TONNES PRODUCED TO END OF AUG; 301WT PRODUCED IN JULY AND 444WT PRODUCED IN AUGUST

BRIEF-Bass Metals Says Graphmada On Track To Achieve Record Mining Metrics In Sept Qtr
